Header: No reason for Sri Lankan's employed in South Korea to have any undue fear; FEB
Content: The bureau of foreign employment says that there is no reason for Sri Lankans employed in South Korea to have any undue fear as a result of the tense atmosphere currently prevalent in North Korea and South Korea. Bureau of Foreign Employment Media spokesman, Deputy General Manager Mangala Randeniya said that the Bureau had already prepared a programme that should be implemented if an emergency situation cropped up. The spokesman said further that a special discussion of the Bureau of Foreign Employment was also held last afternoon with regard to this.
